田代容疑者が薬物依存症の実体験語る動画削除…ＮＨＫ

07 Nov 2019, 12:01

　元タレント田代まさし容疑者（６３）が覚醒剤取締法違反（所持）の疑いで宮城県警に逮捕されたことを受け、ＮＨＫ大阪拠点放送局は７日の定例記者会見で、Ｅテレのバラエティー番組「バリバラ」の番組ホームページなどから、田代容疑者が出演した７月４、１１日放送分を紹介した動画を削除したことを明らかにした。番組は同局の制作で、田代容疑者が逮捕された６日に削除したという。
　田代容疑者は番組で、薬物依存症について実体験を語っていた。福島広明・制作部長は「リハビリに励み、薬物に頼らない生活を長期間続けている当事者ということが前提の番組だった。逮捕を受け、動画を掲載することは適切ではないと判断した」と説明した。

Tashiro suspects remove video to talk about drug addiction experience ... NHK

07 Nov 2019, 12:01

Former Tamashiro Tashiro suspect (63) was arrested by the Miyagi Prefectural Police on suspicion of violating the stimulant control law (possessed), NHK Osaka-based broadcasting station at a regular press conference on the 7th, It was revealed that the video introducing the July 4th and 11th broadcasts in which Tashiro appeared in the program website of Barbara was deleted. The program was produced by the same station and was deleted on the 6th when Tashiro was arrested.
Tashiro talked about actual experiences about drug addiction on the program. Hiroaki Fukushima, director of production, said, “It was a program based on the premise of being a party that has been rehabilitating and has been living for a long time without relying on drugs. explained.
